class.name: AudioStreamPlaybackRandomizer
class.description: Playback instance for [AudioStreamRandomizer]. After setting the [code]stream[/code] property of [AudioStreamPlayer], [AudioStreamPlayer2D], or [AudioStreamPlayer3D], the playback instance can be obtained by calling [method AudioStreamPlayer.get_stream_playback], [method AudioStreamPlayer2D.get_stream_playback], or [method AudioStreamPlayer3D.get_stream_playback] methods.
